item.title: The Pulse: Could a 5-day RTO be around the corner for Big Tech?
item.description: Meta’s Instagram division will require employees to return to the office five days a week starting February 2. This marks Meta as the second tech giant, after Amazon, to enforce a full RTO policy. CEO Adam Mosseri highlighted that in-person collaboration boosts creativity and efficiency. Key changes include reduced meetings and a focus on product prototypes over slides. This decision impacts about 25% of Meta’s workforce, raising questions about whether other divisions will follow suit….

item.title: Downdetector and the real cost of no upstream dependencies
item.description: During the recent Cloudflare outage, Downdetector also faced downtime, highlighting its reliance on Cloudflare.
